knimeNode.name: Dict Replacer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Replaces document terms that match with dictionary keys by the corresponding specified values.

fullDescription.intro: Replaces terms contained in the input documents that match with specified dictionary terms by the corresponding specified value. The dictionary file need to be specified. Each line of the dictionary file must contain a key and a value. If the key matches with a term, the term is replaced by the value. The key and value pairs must be separated by ",".

tab.name: Preprocessing options
tab.option: The column containing the documents to preprocess.
If checked, the documents will be replaced by the new preprocessed documents. Otherwise the preprocessed documents will be appended as new column.
The name of the new appended column, containing the preprocessed documents.
If checked, unmodifiable terms will be preprocessed too.

tab.name: Dictionary options
tab.option: The path of the dictionary file to use.

option.name: Replace words not in the dictionary by

tab.option:
If checked, all words that are not available in the dictionary are replaced by the string entered in the text field.
Note: Entering an empty string or a string consisting solely of whitespaces leads to the removal of all terms not contained in the dictionary.
Select the tokenizer used for word tokenization. Go to Preferences -> KNIME -> Textprocessing to read the description for each tokenizer.

ports.inPort: The input table which contains the documents to preprocess.
ports.outPort: The output table which contains the preprocessed documents.
